title: God is Peaceful
description:
Readings from:

Psalm 29:11

Isaiah 9:6-7

Romans 5:1-2

1 Thessalonians 5:23

2 Thessalonians 3:16

Today's passages were read by Barnabas Piper, a podcaster and author. He also serves at Immanuel Church in Nashville, Tennessee.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
